selfIntroduction.content:
As a mobile developer with 6 years of experience, I specialize in Flutter and Native Android development.
I have proactively led projects in various environments, from startups to growing organizations,
with particular strengths in architecture design aimed at improving code quality and development productivity.

poppop.title: PopPop
poppop.description: Gift card trading and commerce app
poppop.fullDescription: A platform where users can purchase, exchange, and gift various gift cards.

problemSolvings.problem: In the existing MVC pattern, the UI and business logic were tightly coupled, causing UI code to be affected whenever payment logic was modified.
problemSolvings.solution: Introduced Riverpod + ViewModel pattern to strictly separate UI and logic. Managed payment logic as a separate Provider to improve maintainability.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Gained a deep understanding of the importance of state management patterns through this project.

problemSolvings.problem: Scroll jank occurred on list screens that loaded many images, degrading user experience.
problemSolvings.solution: Integrated cached_network_image with a dedicated image resizing cache server, optimizing scroll performance to 60fps.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Gained experience in building stable payment systems even under high traffic conditions.

problemSolvings.problem: Expanding features was difficult due to complex state management.
problemSolvings.solution: Modularized state management logic to maximize reusability.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Achievements include a crash rate reduction to under 0.1% after refactoring.

contributions: Global state management and business logic separation using Riverpod
Deep link handling and navigation structure design using GoRouter
Push notification system implementation based on Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM)
Integration of complex payment processes and external payment modules
achievements: Introduced Riverpod state management to perfectly separate and modularize complex payment logic into business logic and UI
Optimized list scrolling performance to maintain 60fps by introducing image caching and resizing server

cpass.title: CPASS
cpass.description: Rediscovered and launched existing native Android app in Flutter with design renewal, chat, and coin trading features.
cpass.fullDescription: Remade the existing native Android app with Flutter, adding features like chat and coin trading while renewing the UI/UX.

problemSolvings.problem: The existing native app was difficult to maintain and required separate development staff for iOS/Android, resulting in low cost-efficiency.
problemSolvings.solution: Adopted Flutter cross-platform to handle both markets with a single codebase, improving development productivity by 200%.
problemSolvings.conclusion: A successful case of transitioning legacy code to modern cross-platform technology.

problemSolvings.problem: Frequent WebSocket connection instability occurred when implementing real-time chat.
problemSolvings.solution: Implemented Socket.io along with custom reconnection logic and an offline queuing system to prevent message loss.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Acquired deep domain knowledge by re-analyzing existing business logic during the migration process.

problemSolvings.problem: Performance issues occurred when processing large amounts of data.
problemSolvings.solution: Integrated Hive DB to optimize local data caching.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Greatly contributed to reducing maintenance costs.

Supported local data caching and offline mode using Hive DB
Applied multi-language support (i18n) for global service

brk.title: BRK Foundation
brk.description: Philippine NGO donation app with coin donation and tracking features.
brk.fullDescription: A platform for a Philippine NGO that allows donations via coins and aggregates donation amounts.

problemSolvings.problem: Rendering performance issues and excessive memory usage occurred when displaying thousands of donation locations on a map at once.
problemSolvings.solution: Adopted Google Maps Clustering (ClusterManager) to group markers based on zoom level, minimizing rendering load.
problemSolvings.conclusion: A project where I learned how technology can contribute to creating actual social value.

problemSolvings.problem: Data loading failures were frequent due to poor local network environments.
problemSolvings.solution: Applied Retry Interceptor to Retrofit and local caching in Room DB for critical data, implementing an Offline-First architecture.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Secured technical capability in optimizing and integrating Geographic Information Systems (GIS) into mobile apps.

problemSolvings.problem: The complex donation process needed to be simplified.
problemSolvings.solution: Streamlined the donation process step-by-step considering User Experience (UX).
problemSolvings.conclusion: Experienced the importance of Offline-First architecture firsthand.

contributions: RESTful API communication module design using Retrofit
Google Maps API integration and custom marker clustering
App performance optimization and memory leak prevention
Animation and interaction implementation for UX improvement
achievements: Optimized rendering performance of thousands of markers by applying Google Maps Clustering
Ensured app usability even in unstable network environments by introducing offline-first architecture

digiLab.title: DigiLab
digiLab.description: Blockchain wallet providing wallet creation, remittance, swap, and QR payment.
digiLab.fullDescription: Comprehensive mobile wallet app for blockchain assets.

problemSolvings.problem: Blockchain transaction processing is asynchronous and has a high probability of failure, making it difficult to give clear feedback to users.
problemSolvings.solution: Implemented a state machine that polls transaction status and reflects progress in real-time in the UI.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Gained a deep understanding of the Android framework by building a fintech app requiring high security and reliability from scratch by myself.

problemSolvings.problem: Security requirements for managing private keys and mnemonic codes safely were extremely demanding.
problemSolvings.solution: Used Android Keystore System to encrypt and store sensitive data, and applied rooting detection and screen capture prevention.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Felt great reward in advancing the app by reflecting user feedback after launch.

problemSolvings.problem: Performance degradation was expected due to complex encryption logic.
problemSolvings.solution: Handled encryption tasks on background threads to maintain UI responsiveness.
problemSolvings.conclusion: Deeply recognized the importance of secure coding.

Asynchronous task processing and UI thread optimization using Coroutine
Blockchain wallet creation and transaction processing logic implementation
